sailpoint.object
Class EntitlementComment

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      sailpoint.object.Comment
          sailpoint.object.EntitlementComment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, EntitlementHistoryItem, sailpoint.tools.Localizable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class EntitlementComment
extends Comment
implements EntitlementHistoryItem

Stores comments made on a given certifiable.

isSimiliarViolation

public boolean isSimiliarViolation(PolicyViolation otherViolation)
                            throws GeneralException
Deprecated. 
Returns true if the comment was made on the given violation.

Prior to 3.0 violations were deleted whenever a policy scan was run, so ha comparison had to be performed on the violation details rather than using the ID. This code needs to remain for a while so that an accurate comparison can be obtained for older violations.

Specified by:
isSimiliarViolation in interface EntitlementHistoryItem
Parameters:
otherViolation - PolicyViolation to compare
Returns:
True if the given violation is the same as the violation referenced by this decision.
Throws:
GeneralException
